outputs.crs_descr: Public sector policy and administrative management

outputs.output_descr:
Supporting the Modernization of the Ministry of Transport (MOT):
The project aims at supporting the Ministry of Transport's efforts in maintaining and enhancing a transport system that would cater for the high and constantly growing demand, bearing in mind five main priorities: the safety and security of the citizens, the quality of the services, the efficient regulation of the services, the environment, and ease of accessibility to people with physical disabilities.  These priorities are to be enhanced while focusing on the different transportation levels: the infrastructure, the basic structure, the superstructure, the services, the service provider and the quality. The project will target 7 main national entities namely the Egyptian National Railways (ENR), the National Authority of Tunnels (NAT), the River Transport Authority (RTA), the General Authority for Land and Dry Ports (GALDP), the General Authority for Roads, Bridges and Land Transport (GARBLT), the General Authority for Maritime Safety (GAMS) and the National Transportation Institute (ENTI) .   In addition, the project will include an eighth output titled Decision Support Unit to provide strategic advice for MOT decision-making processes and to supervise & coordinate between all 7 other outputs through M&E  activities and deliverable, setting strategies and formulating policies.

donor_name: General Authority for Land and Dry ports

These priorities are to be enhanced while focusing on the different transportation levels: the infrastructure, the basic structure, the superstructure, the services, the service provider and the quality. The project will target 7 main national entities namely the Egyptian National Railways (ENR), the National Authority of Tunnels (NAT), the River Transport Authority (RTA), the General Authority for Land and Dry Ports (GALDP), the General Authority for Roads, Bridges and Land Transport (GARBLT), the General Authority for Maritime Safety (GAMS) and the National Transportation Institute (ENTI) . Supporting the Modernization of the Ministry of Transport (MOT)
The project aims at supporting the Ministry of Transport's efforts in maintaining and enhancing a transport system that would cater for the high and constantly growing demand, bearing in mind five main priorities: the safety and security of the citizens, the quality of the services, the efficient regulation of the services, the environment, and ease of accessibility to people with physical disabilities.  These priorities are to be enhanced while focusing on the different transportation levels: the infrastructure, the basic structure, the superstructure, the services, the service provider and the quality. The project will target 7 main national entities namely the Egyptian National Railways (ENR), the National Authority of Tunnels (NAT), the River Transport Authority (RTA), the General Authority for Land and Dry Ports (GALDP), the General Authority for Roads, Bridges and Land Transport (GARBLT), the General Authority for Maritime Safety (GAMS) and the National Transportation Institute (ENTI) .
